text: Xavier Hunault (29 January 1923 – 16 January 2021) was a French politician. From 1959 to 1989, he was Mayor of Châteaubriant. From 1962 to 1993, Hunault was a member of the National Assembly. He was born in Châteaubriant. Hunault died on 16 January 2021, aged 97. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French mayors
title: Xavier Hunault
